languages.text: "Кому интересно мнение недалекой черни? Пусть служат и умирают ради нас, оставив свои измышления при себе".

traits.locale_text: "Если таков твой путь служения Императору — я ничего не имею против".

languages.text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."
languages.original_text: "Кому интересно мнение недалекой черни? Пусть служат и умирают ради нас, оставив свои измышления при себе".

traits.locale_text: "Who cares for the opinion of short-sighted rabble? Let them serve for us, die for us and keep their thoughts to themselves."
"Who cares for the opinion of short-sighted rabble? Let them serve for us, die for us and keep their thoughts to themselves."
"Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."
"Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."
"Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

languages.text: “谁在乎那些目光短浅的乌合之众怎么想？只要他们能为我们服务，为我们牺牲，他们愿意怎么想就怎么想。”
languages.original_text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

traits.locale_text: “谁在乎那些目光短浅的乌合之众怎么想？只要他们能为我们服务，为我们牺牲，他们愿意怎么想就怎么想。”

languages.text: «¿A quién le importa lo que piense esa gentuza corta de miras? Mientras nos sirvan y mueran en nuestro nombre, que piensen lo que quieran».
languages.original_text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

traits.locale_text: «¿A quién le importa lo que piense esa gentuza corta de miras? Mientras nos sirvan y mueran en nuestro nombre, que piensen lo que quieran».

languages.text: 「近視眼的な庶民の意見など気にする必要があるか？彼らは私たちに仕え、私たちのために死ぬことができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「近視眼的な庶民の意見など気にする必要があるか？彼らは私たちに仕え、私たちのために死ぬことができるのだ」

languages.text: "Wen schert schon die Meinung des kurzsichtigen Pöbels? Sie können uns dienen und für uns sterben und ihre Gedanken für sich behalten."
languages.original_text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Wen schert schon die Meinung des kurzsichtigen Pöbels? Sie können uns dienen und für uns sterben und ihre Gedanken für sich behalten."

languages.text: « Qui peut bien se soucier de l'opinion du bas peuple ? Qu'ils se contentent de nous servir et de mourir pour nous, leur avis n'a aucune importance. »
languages.original_text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Qui peut bien se soucier de l'opinion du bas peuple ? Qu'ils se contentent de nous servir et de mourir pour nous, leur avis n'a aucune importance. »

languages.text: "Basiretsiz ayaktakımının ne düşündüğü kimin umurunda? Bize hizmet edip uğrumuza can versinler yeter. Akıllarından geçenleri bilmeye lüzumu yok."
languages.original_text: "Who cares for the opinion of the short-sighted rabble? They can serve us and die for us, and keep their thoughts to themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Basiretsiz ayaktakımının ne düşündüğü kimin umurunda? Bize hizmet edip uğrumuza can versinler ama akıllarından ne geçtiğini duymak istemiyorum."
